summary: This is an affidavit from an AT&T Legal Compliance Analyst and Custodian of Records verifying the authenticity of AT&T subscriber and call detail records. The affidavit states that copies of records were mailed by Christian R. Everdell to the National Compliance Center on October 14, 2021, and attests to their reliability as business records.

persons.name: Christian R. Everdell
persons.context: Mailed copies of AT&T billing records to the National Compliance Center on October 14, 2021.

events.title: Mailing of AT&T Records
events.description: Christian R. Everdell mailed copies of AT&T subscriber and call detail records to the National Compliance Center.

events.title: Affidavit Execution
events.description: An AT&T Legal Compliance Analyst and Custodian of Records executed an affidavit verifying the authenticity of AT&T records.

locations: 11760 US HIGHWAY 1, SUITE 600 NORTH PALM BEACH, FL 33408-3029
keyFacts: An AT&T Custodian of Records verified the authenticity of AT&T subscriber and call detail records via affidavit.
Christian R. Everdell mailed the records to the National Compliance Center on October 14, 2021.
The affidavit attests that the records were made in the regular course of AT&T's business in 2008 and are reliable.
The records were originally provided without certification by an analyst at the AT&T GLDC and have been purged, so they cannot be recreated in the same format.
The affidavit was executed on October 20, 2021, in Palm Beach County, Florida.
